V0216_01_00_00_0.text:
I am Aporia.
The guardian of despair.

V0216_01_00_00_1.text: Feel the power that can only be born from misery and anger!

V0216_01_00_01_0.text: You'll be the sacrifice to build a new future for mankind!

V0216_01_00_02_0.text:
Emotions lead to mistakes.
That is why I became a machine.

V0216_01_00_03_0.text: The future can only exist if you no longer exist.

V0216_01_00_05_0.text: I'll unleash all my suffering into a single Duel!

V0216_01_00_06_1.text: No matter the outcome, we are forever family.

V0216_01_00_07_1.text: No matter the outcome, we are forever family.

V0216_03_00_00_0.text:
There's no hope left.
All that awaits you is despair.

V0216_03_00_01_0.text: It's time I end your existence.

V0216_03_00_03_0.text: Optimism is nothing but an illusion.

V0216_03_00_04_0.text: I won't let you Synchro Summon!

V0216_03_00_05_0.text:
I'm not afraid!
Because I feel nothing!

V0216_05_00_00_0.text: You're the one who'll succumb to despair - not me!

V0216_06_01_01_0.text: Is that supposed to scare me?

V0216_07_09_00_0.text: I flip over my Set card!

V0216_07_09_01_0.text: This is the card I set!

V0216_11_01_00_0.text: I summon a monster in Defense Position!

V0216_16_00_00_0.text: Feel the same pain that I've felt all my life!

V0216_16_00_01_0.text: This attack will end you - but begin a new future!

V0216_21_00_00_0.text: Your defeat will give rise to a new future.

V0216_21_00_01_0.text: What you're feeling is known as despair.

V0216_21_00_02_0.text: With this, I'm ending my turn.

V0216_21_00_04_0.text:
Enjoy your lead.
You won't have one in the end!

V0216_21_00_05_0.text:
I'm no longer human...
So why does my heart hurt...?

V0216_28_00_00_0.text: I've opened the door to despair and defeat!

V0216_28_00_01_0.text:
How does it feel to be completely helpless?
Hahahaha!

V0216_28_00_02_0.text:
It's the beginning of a new world!
One without sadness!

V0216_28_00_03_0.text: Humans cling to hope because of fear.

V0216_28_00_03_1.text: So when all hope is lost, they cannot survive.

V0216_28_00_04_0.text: Humans let their emotions misguide them to self-destruction.

V0216_28_00_05_0.text: Humans! Learn how powerless you are!

V0216_28_00_05_1.text: You're not worthy of leading the future!

V0216_28_00_06_0.text: You cannot win when the three of us merge to one.

V0216_28_00_07_0.text: You will never be able to defeat me.

V0216_28_00_08_0.text: Is this your first taste of hopelessness?

V0216_29_00_01_0.text: I let my emotions defeat me...

V0216_29_00_02_0.text: I'm no longer human, so why do I still feel these emotions?

V0216_29_00_04_0.text:
Z-one...
Remember that there's always hope...

V0216_29_00_05_0.text:
Antinomy...
You believe that they'll save the future...

V0216_29_00_06_0.text: This is the power of a Signer...

V0216_29_00_07_0.text:
What is this I feel?
Is it... despair?

V0216_29_00_07_1.text:
No...
What I feel is... hope.

V0216_29_00_08_0.text: This child has grown into a Signer!?

V0216_33_00_00_0.text: There are no flaws in my Dueling!

V0216_33_00_01_0.text: Allow me to squash any hope you have of winning!

V0216_33_00_02_0.text: Plummet into the depths of despair!

V0216_30_00_00_0.text: End your turn and learn how it feels to be hopeless.

V0216_30_00_01_0.text: You should surrender to avoid needless suffering.

V0216_34_00_00_0.text: A machine cannot be misled by emotions.

V0216_34_00_01_0.text: The more you act, the more LP you'll lose.

V0216_34_00_02_0.text: I knew you would be a formidable Duelist.

V0216_34_00_04_0.text: Why do you want to make me suffer?

V0216_34_00_05_0.text: How can my heart hurt when I'm no longer human?

V0216_34_00_06_0.text: I quit being human so I would never have to feel again!

V0216_34_00_07_0.text: The despair of losing those who love you.

V0216_34_00_08_0.text: The despair of losing those you love.

V0216_35_00_00_0.text: Anguish, hopelessness and pain merge into one.

V0216_35_00_01_0.text:
My name is Aporia.
The guardian of despair.

V0216_36_00_00_0.text:
End this Duel.
Actually, end everything!

V0216_08_00_00_0.text: I activate my Field Spell, Meklord Fortress!

V0216_08_00_00_1.text: Synchro Monsters can no longer affect Meklord Emperors!

V0216_08_00_01_0.text: When Meklord Fortress is destroyed, its effect activates!

V0216_08_00_01_1.text: I add one Meklord Emperor in my deck to my hand!

V0216_08_00_02_0.text: I activate the Continuous Spell,  Meklord Assembly!

V0216_08_00_03_1.text: I discard a card to destroy one monster on my field!

V0216_08_00_04_0.text: When a Meklord is destroyed, Meklord Assembly activates!

V0216_08_00_04_1.text: It destroys one face-up Spell or Trap Card!

V0216_08_00_05_0.text: I activate Boon of the Meklord Emperor to draw 2 cards!

V0216_08_00_06_0.text: I activate the Quick-Play Spell, Meklord Deflection!

V0216_08_00_07_0.text: I activate Meklord Deflection's effect from my Graveyard!

V0216_08_00_07_1.text: I banish it to prevent a Meklord from being destroyed!

V0216_08_00_08_0.text: I activate the Field Spell, Fortissimo the Mobile Fortress!

V0216_08_00_09_0.text: Fortissimo the Mobile Fortress's effect activates!

V0216_08_00_09_1.text: I Special Summon a Meklord Army from my hand!

V0216_08_00_10_0.text:
I activate my Spell Card!
Reboot!

V0216_08_00_10_1.text: I return a Meklord to my deck to get another Meklord card!

V0216_08_00_11_0.text:
I activate my Continuous Spell!
The Resolute Meklord Army!

V0216_08_00_11_1.text: My Meklord Army can't use effects or be destroyed in battle!

V0216_08_00_12_0.text: I activate the Quick-Play Spell, Limiter Removal!

V0216_08_00_13_0.text: I will end your existence for the welfare of the future!

V0216_08_00_13_1.text: I activate the Spell Card, Afterglow!

V0216_08_00_14_0.text:
I activate the Spell Card, Aurora Draw!
I draw two cards!

V0216_08_00_15_0.text: I activate my Spell Card, Chaos Bloom!

V0216_08_00_16_0.text: I activate the Spell Card, Chaos Blast!

V0216_08_00_17_0.text: I activate the Spell Card, Future Destruction!

V0216_08_00_18_0.text:
I will not be crushed!
I activate my Trap!
Chaos Infinity!

V0216_08_00_19_0.text:
I activate my Trap!
Mektimed Blast!

V0216_08_00_19_1.text: It destroys my Meklord and one card on your field!

V0216_08_00_20_0.text:
I activate my Trap!
Meklord Astro the Eradicator!

V0216_08_00_21_0.text: I banish Meklord Astro the Eradicator from my Graveyard!

V0216_08_00_22_0.text: I activate the Trap Card, Meklord Factory!

V0216_08_00_23_0.text:
I activate my Trap!
High Rate Draw!

V0216_08_00_24_0.text: I activate High Rate Draw's effect from my Graveyard!

V0216_08_00_25_0.text:
I activate my Trap!
Twin Vortex!

V0216_08_00_26_0.text:
I activate my Trap!
Battle Return!

V0216_08_00_27_0.text:
I activate my Continuous Trap!
Divergence!

V0216_08_00_29_0.text:
I activate my Trap!
Convert Ghost!

V0216_08_00_30_0.text:
I activate my Trap!
Infinity Force!

V0216_08_00_31_0.text: Since you attacked me, I can activate Cursed Synchro!

V0216_08_00_31_1.text: Synchro Monsters can no longer attack!

V0216_08_00_32_0.text:
I activate my Trap Card!
Meklord Emperor Creation!

V0216_08_00_33_0.text: I activate my Continuous Trap, Infinite Prison!

V0216_09_00_00_0.text: Witness the overwhelming power of Meklord Astro Mekanikle!

V0216_09_00_00_1.text: It absorbs your Synchro Monster and gains its ATK!

V0216_09_00_01_1.text: By disposing of a monster it absorbed, you take damage!

V0216_09_00_02_0.text: When Asterisk is Special Summoned, its effect activates!

V0216_09_00_02_1.text: It gets the ATK of the monsters it sent to the Graveyard!

V0216_09_00_03_1.text:
Pain rains down from the heavens!
Nemesis Tornado!

V0216_09_00_04_0.text:
You dare Synchro Summon!?
I activate Asterisk's effect!

V0216_09_00_05_0.text: Triskelion uses its effect to absorb a card from your deck!

V0216_09_00_07_0.text: If an effect destroys Infinity Core, it uses its own effect!

V0216_09_00_08_0.text: An effect destroyed my monster, so I Special Summon this!

V0216_09_00_09_0.text: I use Wisel's effect to Special Summon it!

V0216_09_00_10_1.text: Once per turn, it can absorb your Synchro Monster!

V0216_09_00_11_0.text: Your Synchro Monster will fuel my Meklord's strength!

V0216_09_00_12_1.text: Once per turn, it can negate and destroy your Spell Card!

V0216_09_00_13_0.text: I use Meklord Emperor Skiel's effect to Special Summon it!

V0216_09_00_14_1.text: Once per turn, it absorbs a Synchro Monster on your field!

V0216_09_00_15_0.text: I send a monster equipped to my Skiel to the Graveyard!

V0216_09_00_15_1.text: It can now attack you directly this turn!

V0216_09_00_16_0.text: I use Meklord Emperor Granel's effect to Special Summon it!

V0216_09_00_17_1.text: Once per turn, it absorbs a Synchro Monster on your field!

V0216_09_00_18_1.text: It Special Summons a monster that's equipped to it!

V0216_09_00_19_0.text: I send a Meklord to the Graveyard to Special Summon this!

V0216_09_00_20_0.text: By Special Summoning it, one of your monsters can't attack!

V0216_09_00_21_0.text: I use Meklord Emperor Wisel - Synchro Absorption's effect!

V0216_09_00_21_1.text: I Tribute it to negate and destroy that card!

V0216_09_00_22_0.text: I activate Meklord Army Deployer Obbligato's effect!

V0216_09_00_22_1.text: I destroy it to Special Summon two Meklord Army monsters!

V0216_09_00_23_0.text: When Obbligato goes to the Graveyard, its effect activates!

V0216_09_00_23_1.text: You take damage during this turn's End Phase!

V0216_09_00_24_0.text: Meklord Army of Wisel's effect activates!

V0216_09_00_24_1.text: The attacking monster deals piercing damage!

V0216_09_00_25_0.text: Meklord Army of Skiel's effect activates!

V0216_09_00_25_1.text: It Special Summons a Meklord Army from my deck!

V0216_09_00_26_0.text: Meklord Army of Granel's effect activates!

V0216_37_00_00_0.text: Anguish, hopelessness and pain give rise to a new power!

V0216_13_00_00_0.text:
The embodiment of despair!
Meklord Astro Mekanikle!

V0216_37_00_01_0.text: You cling on to hope, but you won't anymore!

V0216_13_00_01_0.text: I Special Summon Meklord Astro Dragon Asterisk!

V0216_13_00_02_0.text: I Special Summon Meklord Astro Dragon Triskelion!

V0216_13_00_04_0.text:
Combine into one!
Meklord Emperor Wisel!

V0216_13_00_07_0.text:
Power up!
Meklord Emperor Wisel - Synchro Absorption!

V0216_13_00_09_0.text:
Come on out!
Meklord Army of Wisel!

V0216_13_00_11_0.text:
Rise up!
Meklord Army of Granel!

V0216_19_00_00_0.text: Feel the wrath of Meklord Astro Mekanikle!

V0216_19_00_05_0.text:
Meklord Emperor Skiel!
Let 'em have it!

V0216_19_00_07_0.text:
Meklord Emperor Wisel - Synchro Absorption!
Take 'em down!
